SELECT b.code,k.value as boardkindValue,h.value as headlinevalue,b.membercode,b.title,b.viewcount,b.likecount,b.regdate FROM BOARDFREE b join headline h on b.headlinecode = h.code join boardkind k on b.boardkindcode= k.code WHERE b.membercode=(select code from member where code=${code})

SELECT r.code,k.value as boardkindValue,h.value as headlinevalue,r.title,r.viewcount,r.likecount,r.regdate FROM boardreview r join headline h on r.headlinecode = h.code join boardkind k on r.boardkindcode= k.code join member m on r.membercode=m.code WHERE r.membercode=(select code from member where code=${code})
